title: My Good Week
author: Slava Minamoto
excerpt: My Good Week helps you achieve long-term goals by breaking them into weekly activities. With automatic tracking via Google Calendar, weekly reviews, and deep insights, it’s the most comprehensive habit tracker across Web, Mac, iOS, and Android.
